name: candles (ty)
description:
candles

play games with candles

made in a week for the class "prototype studio" at the nyu game center. the theme was "good luck".

controls
- wasd & mouselook
- hold left-click: grab stuff (finicky)
- hold right-click/space: move the held item around w/ mouse
- q & e: to rotate the held item
- ctrl+r: reset
